titleStmt.title: Ór lǽknisbók : AM 655 XXX 4to : A digital edition

editor.name:
Fabian Schwabe
Ernst-Moritz-Arndt-Universität Greifswald and Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen

respStmt.resp: Transcription, lemmatization, morphological encoding and conversion to Menotic XML
respStmt.name:
Fabian Schwabe
Ernst-Moritz-Arndt-Universität Greifswald and Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen

availability.p: Licence accepted by the editor Fabian Schwabe in a mail to Alex Speed Kjeldsen 5 November 2015.

sourceDesc.bibl: Photographic facsimiles of the encoded part of the manuscript from the Arnamagnæan Collection in Copenhagen.

msIdentifier.msName: Ór lǽknisbók The fragment is unnamed, but Konráð Gíslason named his edition of the text Úr læknisbók, which is published in Fire og fyrretyve for en stor deel forhen utrykte prøver af oldnordisk sprog og literatur (1860)

msContents.p: A fragment of an herbarium. Parts of this herbarium are also in the manuscripts or manuscript fragments AM 434 a 12mo, AM 194 8vo and MS Royal Irish Academy 23 D 43

layout.p: The text ist missing initials and headings, but has space for them.

origin.p: Written in Iceland in the c. 1250-1300.

projectDesc.p: This manuscript text has been encoded according to the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 3.0), at https://www.menota.org/HB3_index.xml as of 2019-12-12.

correction.p: This text has been proofread thoroughly by the editor, Fabian Schwabe.

normalization.p: This text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised.

interpretation.p: The complete text has been lemmatised and morphologically analysed according to the rules specified in ch. 11 of the Menota Handbook, v. 3.0.

revisionDesc.change: 2020-03-27 Fabian Schwabe Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen: (1) Made minor corrections regarding the morphosyntactical annotation; (2) Added informations to the teiHeader

2020-02-20
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Made a few consistency corrections of the me:msa name tokens

2016-10-20
Fabian Schwabe Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen : (1) Changed the encoding of expanded abbreviations; (2) Made the file v. 2.1

2016-10-19
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Replaced "Á" with "é" (being the result of incorrect conversion from character entities; (2) Made the file v. 2.0.9

2016-03-29
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Changed the encoding of supplied hyphens from "supplied type="hyphenated"" to "pc type="supplied"" (for hyphens supplied by the editor, and lacking in the manuscript); (2) Made the file v. 2.0.8

2016-03-15
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Checked various readings, but found nothing missing: (2) Made the file v. 2.0.7 (even if no changes have been made)

2016-02-27
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Added a missing "w" element in the file, for the second part of "mannshold" in fol 1v l. 4; (4) Made the file v. 2.0.6

2016-02-23
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Added the number of words in the file (1335) in the "extent" element; (2) Revised the "availability" element in the header with a CC-BY-SA 4.0 licence; (3) Revised the "editorialDecl" element in header to specify the level of correction (high), the levels of transcription (facs, dipl, norm), and the amount of annotation (completely); (4) Made the file v. 2.0.5

2016-01-23
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Replaced all 27 "me:punct type="supplied"" elements within "w" elements with "supplied type="hyphenated"" elements, so as to avoid having "me:punct" elements within "w" elements; (2) Made the file v. 2.0.4

2016-01-19
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Specified Fabian Schwabe as editor; (2) Changed the "msName" to simply "Úr læknisbók"; (3) Stated that the Menota ms. number is 16; (4) Made the file v. 2.0.2
2016-01-13 Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Added the attribute ed="ms" to all "pb" and "lb" elements; (2) Made the file v. 2.0.1

change.name: Fabian Schwabe, Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen: Lemmatisation.

revisionDesc.change: 2008-07-31 Tone Merete Bruvik, Aksis: Minor errors corected to make file valid.
2008-07-31 Fabian Schwabe, Ernst-Moritz-Arndt-Universität Greifswald: Final draft.
2008-04-09 Tone Merete Bruvik, Aksis: Updated the header to make it valid according to the Menota P5 DTD.
2008-04-02 Fabian Schwabe, Ernst-Moritz-Arndt-Universität Greifswald: First draft.
